articles.author: Sean Carey
articles.title: EA shutting servers for Xbox 360 title Syndicate in June - TrueAchievements
articles.description: EA has announced that servers for Xbox 360 first-person shooter Syndicate will close later this year, discontinuing 12 achievements in the process.
